description: Changes the route table associated with a given subnet, internet gateway, or virtual private gateway in a VPC. After the operation completes, the subnet or gateway uses the routes in the new route table. For more information about route tables, see Route tables in the Amazon VPC User Guide. You can also use this operation to change which table is the main route table in the VPC. Specify the main route table's association ID and the route table ID of the new main route table.

parameters.name: RouteTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the new route table to associate with the subnet.

nested_items.name: NewAssociationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the new association.
